subject: Hockey, Ice

Stanley Cup
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: 7.7 seconds. That was the tormenting time remaining in regulation when the Sabres created a 1-1 tie in Game 5 on Friday night in Buffalo, then won in overtime.
